column2: The three core cities of the Great Lakes Oligarchy are vying to host the formal seat of the goverment. Previously, Milwaukee has been used as an informal meeting location. As the GLO has developed, it is now time to develop a lasting capital.
column25:
demand_toledo_title;Demand Toledo from the Kingdom of Sandusky;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;
demand_toledo_desc;For far too long have the people of the Great Lakes been separated from the resources and strategic ports in the Toledo Strip. Now that our military is in a favorable position for an offsenive, we should demand the lands be returned to us from Sandusky's empire.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;

column2: Begin the Search for the Big One

For centuries, the people of the Baja region have searched for the mythical Big One - a wave that will deliver the rider to the throne of Neptune himself. Many a barney has been lost at sea in pursuit of the fabled wave, and none has yet to lay eyes on its majestic curl. Perhaps, for a sizeable portion of our state budget, we could organize an excursion lead by professionals in order to finally discover this wave.
